description: Details required by Condition 7 (Levels), Condition 8 (Crime), Condition 11 (Landscape Scheme), Condition 12 (Planting), Condition 13 (Arboricultural Method Statement, Tree Protection Plan  a Schedule of Arboricultural Supervision), Condition 17 (Contaminated Land Assessment), Condition 18 (Remedial Strategy), Condition 22 (Amenity Space Enclosure), Condition 25 (Construction Method Statement/Dust Management Plan), Condition 26 (Construction Management), Condition 28 (Refuse  Recycling Facilities) and Condition 30 (Cycle Parking) of Planning Permission 18/14633/FUL
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are fully discharged.

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.
The fee required for your pre-application advice is Â£300.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, or online via the Kingston council website.
